Submodules

snl.es_gui.tools.dms module

class snl.es_gui.tools.dms.DataManagementSystem(save_name, save_data=False, max_memory=500000)[source]

Bases: object

A class used to store processed DataFrames as NumPy ndarrays and manage memory consumed. Data is stored in nested dictionaries up to a depth of 2: {key_0: {key_0_0: data}}. When the calculated memory exceeds max_memory, the dictionary at depth 1 at the front of the queue is popped out of the dictionary until the memory consumption is less than the maximum. The queue is determined by time of accessing. Accessing or adding to the structure at any depth will push the depth 1 dictionary to the back of the queue.

Parameters:

  • save_name – The path/filename to pickle the DMS’s data.

  • max_memory – The maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that the contained ndarrays may collectively occupy.

add_data(value, *args)[source]

Adds value to self.data[arg[0]][…][arg[N-1]]. Requeues self.data[arg[0]] after updating.

compute_memory()[source]

Computes the memory footprint of the entire data structure.

delete_pickle()[source]

Deletes the pickle file used for self.data object persistence.

get_data(*args)[source]

Retrieves NumPy ndarray from self.data according to provided sequence of keys.

manage_memory()[source]

Pops entries from the queue until occupied memory is less than the maximum allocated.

pop()[source]

Shortcut for popping the queue of the OrderedDict.

requeue(key)[source]

Moves self.data[key] to the back of the queue for being purged.

save_state()[source]

Pickles self.data at self.save_name.

snl.es_gui.tools.optimizer module

class snl.es_gui.tools.optimizer.Optimizer(solver='glpk')[source]

Bases: object

Abstract base class for Pyomo ConcreteModel optimization framework.

abstract get_results()[source]

A method for returning the results DataFrame plus any other quantities of interest.

abstract instantiate_model()[source]

A method for instantiating the model and assigning Optimizer attributes to model attributes.

property model

Pyomo ConcreteModel.

abstract populate_model()[source]

A method for setting model parameters, variables, and an ExpressionsBlock object for defining objectives and constraints.

property results

A results DataFrame containing series of indices, decision variables, and/or model parameters or derived quantities.

run()[source]

Instantiates, creates, and solves the optimizer model based on supplied information. Use if no steps are needed between constructing the model and solving it.

set_model_parameters(**kwargs)[source]

Sets model parameters in kwargs to their respective values.

solve_model()[source]

Solves the model using the specified solver.

property solver

The name of the solver for Pyomo to use.
